name: cmo-app
description: Client Meeting Organizer - Full-stack application for FIGMINTS

scripts.build:render: npm run install:all && npm run build:client
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:cloudflare: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r client/dist/* . && mkdir -p dist && cp _routes.json dist/ || true
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: FIGMINTS Development Team
